snippet.title: Lords of Thunder - TurboGrafx / Duo VHS Promo Tape
snippet.description: The classic LoT promo tape. One of only three known promotional videos distributed by TTI / NEC.  Beyond great game footage, this particular promotion has a lot of amusing "interviews" (obviously staged) and additional footage of... randomness.  It is clear that the producers had a good time making this video.
